Package no.uib.triogen.processing.ld

Class LdMatrixComputer

java.lang.Object
no.uib.triogen.processing.ld.LdMatrixComputer
public class LdMatrixComputer
extends Object
This class iterates through genotypes and writes a matrix of ld between markers computed using sliding widows of the specified range.
Author:
Marc Vaudel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double LOADING_FACTOR
    Loading factor used to make sure that the buffer contains the ld range.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description

    constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run​(int timeOutDays, boolean testIteration, boolean test)
    Runs the matrix export.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • LOADING_FACTOR

      public static final double LOADING_FACTOR
      Loading factor used to make sure that the buffer contains the ld range. A loading factor of 2 for a sliding window of 10 bp results in buffering 20 pb.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • LdMatrixComputer

      public LdMatrixComputer​(File genotypesFile, GenotypesFileType genotypesFileType, VariantList variantList, ChildToParentMap childToParentMap, String destinationStem, int maxDistance, double minR2, double mafThreshold, boolean hardCalls, int nVariants, double downstreamLoadingFactor, double upstreamLoadingFactor, SimpleCliLogger logger)
      constructor.
      Parameters:
      genotypesFile - The file containing the genotypes.
      genotypesFileType - The type of genotypes file.
      variantList - The variants to process.
      childToParentMap - The map of trios.
      destinationStem - The stem of the path of the file where to write the results.
      maxDistance - The maximal number of bp to allow between variants.
      minR2 - The minimal ld r2 to report (inclusive).
      mafThreshold - The maf threshold. maf is computed in parents and values lower than threshold are not included (inclusive).
      hardCalls - Boolean indicating whether hard calls should be used instead of dosages.
      nVariants - The number of variants to process in parallel.
      downstreamLoadingFactor - The loading factor to use when trimming the buffer.
      upstreamLoadingFactor - The loading factor to use when buffering.
      logger - The logger.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run​(int timeOutDays, boolean testIteration, boolean test) throws InterruptedException, TimeoutException, IOException
      Runs the matrix export.
      Parameters:
      timeOutDays - The time out time in days.
      testIteration - In testIteration mode LD calculations will not be computed.
      test - In test mode only a few variants will be processed.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - exception thrown if the process was interrupted
      TimeoutException - exception thrown if the process timed out
      IOException - exception thrown if an i/o error occurred
